pullrequest.title: Add unit tests for wireless transmitter/receiver sensors

content.raw:
We should have 100% condition coverage in WirelessTransceiver, WirelessReceiver and WirelessTransmitter. I created two separate tests for UpdateImpl(), one with visualization enabled and another with visualization disabled.

You were right, I don't need the condition related with "ground_plane::link::collision" anymore.
content.html:
We should have 100% condition coverage in WirelessTransceiver, WirelessReceiver and WirelessTransmitter. I created two separate tests for UpdateImpl(), one with visualization enabled and another with visualization disabled.

You were right, I don't need the condition related with "ground_plane::collision" anymore.
